original: Bringhammar, Bengt Sigvard, rektor, Olofström, f. 30/6/07 i Osby, Krist. 1. G. 37 m. sjuksköt. Elly Friden. Barn: Jörgen f. 38, Tryggve 40, Agneta 44. — Stud:ex. i Eslöv 26, fil. kand. i Lund 30, fil. mag. 34, disp. fr. provår 42. Tjg. v. Dalsl. folkhögsk., i Hälsingborg, Kristianstad, Sthlm, Visby, Västerås o. Örebro, v. Eslövs h. samsk., Gränna h. folksk. samt Kristianstads, Upps. o. Ånge dito, vik. rektor i Ange 39, rektor i Gränna 39-46, rektor samt ord. ämnesiär. v. Olofströms h. folksk. sed. 46. Krist. nat. i Lund kurator 33-34, var i Gränna led. av stadsfullm. samt ordf. o. förest, f. föreläsn ifören.
translated: Brighammar, Bengt Sigvard, principal, Olofström, b. 30/6/07 in Osby, Krist. 1. Married in 1937 to nurse Elly Friden. Children: Jörgen b. 1938, Tryggve b. 1940, Agneta b. 1944. - Graduated from high school in Eslöv in 1926, Bachelor of Arts from Lund University in 1930, Master of Arts in 1934, earned teaching credentials after a probationary year in 1942. Served at Dalsland folk high school, in Hälsingborg, Kristianstad, Stockholm, Visby, Västerås, and Örebro, at Eslöv high school, Gränna elementary school, Kristianstads, Uppsala and Ånge dito as well as interim principal in Ange in 1939, principal at Gränna from 1939 to 1946, and principal and regular subject teacher at Olofström elementary school since 1946. Christian Democrat in Lund, curator in 1933-34, was a member of the city council and chairman and speaker for the lecture association in Gränna.

subjectOf.text: Member of the City Council and Chairman and Speaker for the Lecture Association in Gränna.
